formFields.legend: Subject of assessment
formFields.name: subjectType
formFields.validation: Please select the relevant subject type

formFields.label: Country of origin
formFields.hint: Select the country where the risk of FGM is most prominent.
formFields.name: country
formFields.validation: Please select the country of origin related to the subject

formFields.name: viewsDiffer
formFields.legend: There is a concern that the parent(s)/carer(s) do not share the same view about FGM
formFields.hint: For example: The mother is pro-FGM and the father is against FGM.
formFields.validation: Please select if the parent(s)/carer(s) views differ around FGM

formFields.name: cdnsr1
formFields.legend: The girl has older female sibling(s) and/or cousin(s) who have undergone FGM.

formFields.name: cdnsr2
formFields.legend: The girl is frightened of being cut and requests help from a trusted adult.

formFields.name: cdnsr4
formFields.legend: The girl (under 18) has confided to a regulated professional that FGM has taken place.
formFields.hint: The girl may have referred to FGM as "cutting" or "circumcision"

formFields.name: cdnsr5
formFields.legend: The parent(s)/carer(s) believe that FGM is necessary to protect against witchcraft/evil spirits/djinns.

formFields.name: cdnsr5-father
formFields.legend: Father: The parent(s)/carer(s) believe that FGM is necessary to protect against witchcraft/evil spirits/djinns.

formFields.name: cdnsr5-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: The parent(s)/carer(s) believe that FGM is necessary to protect against witchcraft/evil spirits/djinns.

formFields.name: cdnsr6
formFields.legend: You observe physical signs which appear to show that an act of FGM has been carried out.
formFields.hint: For clarification regarding ‘physical signs’, refer to the Mandatory Reporting of Female Genital Mutilation Procedural Information.

formFields.name: cdnsr7
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s)/another trusted adult has enquired/stated that they want FGM performed on the girl.

formFields.name: cdnsr7-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s)/another trusted adult has enquired/stated that they want FGM performed on the girl.

formFields.name: cdnsr7-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s)/another trusted adult has enquired/stated that they want FGM performed on the girl.

formFields.name: cdnpr1
formFields.legend: Mother who has undergone FGM is pregnant/has just given birth to a female child.

formFields.name: cdnpr2
formFields.legend: There are plans for the daughter (under 18) to be married in the near or immediate future/there is a history of forced marriage or belief that FGM is required for marriage.

formFields.name: cdnpr3
formFields.legend: The girl is being taking to a country of high prevalence and one or both parent(s)/carer(s) are being evasive about why.

formFields.name: cdnpr7
formFields.legend: The girl has shared that she is to attend a special occasion/ceremony/party 'to become a woman'.

formFields.name: cdncf1
formFields.legend: The girl has a disability or additional needs.

formFields.name: cdncf2
formFields.legend: The girl is an unaccompanied asylum seeking child (under 18).

formFields.name: cdncf3
formFields.legend: The girl is frequently missing or absent from school.

formFields.name: cdncf4
formFields.legend: The girl is reluctant to give consent to undergo a medical examination.

formFields.name: cdnpf1
formFields.legend: The girl is able to identify potential risk indicators in relation to FGM.
formFields.hint: For example if the girl knows the terminology used around FGM she may be able to identify if someone is talking about it and can contact an identified safety person for support.

formFields.name: cdnpf2
formFields.legend: The girl is able to identify the health consequences of FGM.
formFields.hint: FGM is illegal in the UK. Health consequences include death, infection, shock, more information on health consequences can be found at www.nationalfgmcentre.org.uk.

formFields.name: cdnpf3
formFields.legend: The girl has a good understanding of the law around FGM.

formFields.name: cdnpf4
formFields.legend: The girl is developing her knowledge on her human rights.
formFields.hint: Refer to Good Practice Guidance for more details on this. All children should be taught about their rights and that FGM is a violation of these rights.

formFields.name: cdnpf5
formFields.legend: Parent(‘s) relationship with their daughter is nurturing and stable.

formFields.name: cdnpf5-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(‘s) relationship with their daughter is nurturing and stable.

formFields.name: cdnpf5-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(‘s) relationship with their daughter is nurturing and stable.

formFields.name: cdnpf6
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) are against performing FGM on their daughter.

formFields.name: cdnpf6-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) are against performing FGM on their daughter.

formFields.name: cdnpf6-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) are against performing FGM on their daughter.

formFields.name: cdnpf7
formFields.legend: The girl is aware of support services/safety networks available to her.

formFields.name: pcsr1
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) have limited understanding of the harm (physical and emotional) of FGM.
formFields.hint: If you select ‘yes’ you are indicating parent(s)/carer(s) do not have a good understanding/do not accept the health consequences of FGM.

formFields.name: pcsr1-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) have limited understanding of the harm (physical and emotional) of FGM.

formFields.name: pcsr1-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) have limited understanding of the harm (physical and emotional) of FGM.

formFields.name: pcsr2
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) have limited understanding of FGM and the law in the UK.

formFields.name: pcsr2-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) have limited understanding of FGM and the law in the UK.

formFields.name: pcsr2-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) have limited understanding of FGM and the law in the UK.

formFields.name: pcsr3
formFields.legend: Parent/carer/family member are requesting re-infibulation.
formFields.hint: Re-infibulation is the re-stitching of FGM type III to reclose the vagina after childbirth.

formFields.name: pcsr4
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) believe FGM is a religious requirement.

formFields.name: pcsr4-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) believe FGM is a religious requirement.

formFields.name: pcsr4-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) believe FGM is a religious requirement.

formFields.name: pcsr5
formFields.legend: The girl states that parent(s)/carer(s) have been verbally or physically abusive to her for talking about FGM outside the family.
formFields.hint: This could also include the threat of witchcraft.

formFields.name: pcsr6
formFields.legend: There are concerns around disguised compliance.
formFields.hint: The NSPCC provide this definition: 'Disguised compliance' involves a parent or carer giving the appearance of co-operating with child welfare agencies to avoid raising suspicions, to allay professional concerns and ultimately to diffuse professional intervention.

formFields.name: pcsr6-father
formFields.legend: Father: There are concerns around disguised compliance.
formFields.hint: The NSPCC provide this definition: 'Disguised compliance' involves a parent or carer giving the appearance of co-operating with child welfare agencies to avoid raising suspicions, to allay professional concerns and ultimately to diffuse professional intervention.

formFields.name: pcsr6-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: There are concerns around disguised compliance.
formFields.hint: The NSPCC provide this definition: 'Disguised compliance' involves a parent or carer giving the appearance of co-operating with child welfare agencies to avoid raising suspicions, to allay professional concerns and ultimately to diffuse professional intervention.

formFields.name: pcsr8
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) believe FGM is a cultural requirement.

formFields.name: pcsr8-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) believe FGM is a cultural requirement.

formFields.name: pcsr8-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) believe FGM is a cultural requirement.

formFields.name: pcpr1
formFields.legend: There are issues of gender inequality (including: patriarchal/matriarchal views or controlling behaviour that mean one parent/carer is powerless to protect their daughter).

formFields.name: pcpr2
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) are avoidant and resistant to engaging with mainstream services.

formFields.name: pcpr2-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) are avoidant and resistant to engaging with mainstream services.

formFields.name: pcpr2-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) are avoidant and resistant to engaging with mainstream services.

formFields.name: pcpr3
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) are reluctant to allow the girl to be seen by herself and insist on being present at all times.
formFields.hint: This includes parent(s)/carer(s) being reluctant for you to carry out direct work with the girl.

formFields.name: pcpr3-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) are reluctant to allow the girl to be seen by herself and insist on being present at all times.
formFields.hint: This includes parent(s)/carer(s) being reluctant for you to carry out direct work with the girl.

formFields.name: pcpr3-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) are reluctant to allow the girl to be seen by herself and insist on being present at all times.
formFields.hint: This includes parent(s)/carer(s) being reluctant for you to carry out direct work with the girl.

formFields.name: pccf1
formFields.legend: There are concerns around parental/carer(s) mental health and well-being that may impact on parenting.

formFields.name: pccf1-father
formFields.legend: Father: There are concerns around parental/carer(s) mental health and well-being that may impact on parenting.

formFields.name: pccf1-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: There are concerns around parental/carer(s) mental health and well-being that may impact on parenting.

formFields.name: pccf2
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) are isolated with little interaction with the wider community.

formFields.name: pccf2-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) are isolated with little interaction with the wider community.

formFields.name: pccf2-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) are isolated with little interaction with the wider community.

formFields.name: pccf4
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) English is limited and there is a language barrier.

formFields.name: pccf4-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) English is limited and there is a language barrier.

formFields.name: pccf4-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) English is limited and there is a language barrier.

formFields.name: pccf5
formFields.legend: The parent(s)/carer(s) are reluctant to give consent for their daughter to undergo a medical examination.

formFields.name: pccf5-father
formFields.legend: Father: The parent(s)/carer(s) are reluctant to give consent for their daughter to undergo a medical examination.

formFields.name: pccf5-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: The parent(s)/carer(s) are reluctant to give consent for their daughter to undergo a medical examination.

formFields.name: pcpf1
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) have thought about how to keep their daughter safe from risk of FGM.
formFields.hint: This could include supervised contact with high risk people, travel plans etc.

formFields.name: pcpf1-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) have thought about how to keep their daughter safe from risk of FGM.
formFields.hint: This could include supervised contact with high risk people, travel plans etc.

formFields.name: pcpf1-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) have thought about how to keep their daughter safe from risk of FGM.
formFields.hint: This could include supervised contact with high risk people, travel plans etc.

formFields.name: pcpf2
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) have taken active steps to protect their daughter.
formFields.hint: This could include fleeing the risk of FGM, applying for FGMPO, educating family members about FGM.

formFields.name: pcpf2-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) have taken active steps to protect their daughter.
formFields.hint: This could include fleeing the risk of FGM, applying for FGMPO, educating family members about FGM.

formFields.name: pcpf2-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) have taken active steps to protect their daughter.
formFields.hint: This could include fleeing the risk of FGM, applying for FGMPO, educating family members about FGM.

formFields.name: pcpf3
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) have/are developing knowledge around human rights and can apply them to FGM.

formFields.name: widersr2
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) feel powerless to say no to FGM.

formFields.name: widersr2-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) feel powerless to say no to FGM.

formFields.name: widersr2-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) feel powerless to say no to FGM.

formFields.name: widersr3
formFields.legend: There is a strong level of influence on the family by pro-FGM elders/relatives.

formFields.name: widersr4
formFields.legend: There is a concern around flight risk.
formFields.hint: For example: You may be concerned a parent is going to take the child at short notice and go abroad to avoid statutory services.

formFields.name: widersr4-father
formFields.legend: Father: There is a concern around flight risk.
formFields.hint: For example: You may be concerned a father is going to take the child at short notice and go abroad to avoid statutory services.

formFields.name: widersr4-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: There is a concern around flight risk.
formFields.hint: For example: You may be concerned a mother is going to take the child at short notice and go abroad to avoid statutory services.

formFields.name: widerpr1
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s)/girl indicate that FGM is still actively practiced and expected in their community/family.

formFields.name: widerpr1-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s)/girl indicate that FGM is still actively practiced and expected in their community/family.

formFields.name: widerpr1-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s)/girl indicate that FGM is still actively practiced and expected in their community/family.

formFields.name: widerpr2
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) or extended family members believe that not having FGM would bring dishonour on the family.

formFields.name: widerpr2-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) or extended family members believe that not having FGM would bring dishonour on the family.

formFields.name: widerpr2-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) or extended family members believe that not having FGM would bring dishonour on the family.

formFields.name: widerpr3
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) are reluctant to talk about FGM openly.

formFields.name: widerpr3-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) are reluctant to talk about FGM openly.

formFields.name: widerpr3-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) are reluctant to talk about FGM openly.

formFields.name: widerpr4
formFields.legend: Parent(s)/carer(s) are influenced by community/faith leader who advocates for FGM.
formFields.hint: This may be a religious leader or community group leader.

formFields.name: widerpr4-father
formFields.legend: Father: Parent(s)/carer(s) are influenced by community/faith leader who advocates for FGM.
formFields.hint: This may be a religious leader or community group leader.

formFields.name: widerpr4-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: Parent(s)/carer(s) are influenced by community/faith leader who advocates for FGM.
formFields.hint: This may be a religious leader or community group leader.

formFields.name: widerpr5
formFields.legend: The family are claiming asylum and/or have had their asylum claim refused and, if returned to home country the girl may be at risk of FGM.

formFields.name: widercf1
formFields.legend: The Family are seeking asylum.

formFields.name: widercf2
formFields.legend: The girl is within an un-registered private fostering arrangement.

formFields.name: widercf3
formFields.legend: The girl and/or parent(s)/carer(s) have limited information translated into their own language.

formFields.name: widerpf1
formFields.legend: The parent(s)/carer(s) have supportive networks within the community who are against FGM.

formFields.name: widerpf1-father
formFields.legend: Father: The parent(s)/carer(s) have supportive networks within the community who are against FGM.

formFields.name: widerpf1-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: The parent(s)/carer(s) have supportive networks within the community who are against FGM.

formFields.name: widerpf2
formFields.legend: The parent(s)/carer(s) are engaging with services and developing trust in professionals.

formFields.name: widerpf2-father
formFields.legend: Father: The parent(s)/carer(s) are engaging with services and developing trust in professionals.

formFields.name: widerpf2-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: The parent(s)/carer(s) are engaging with services and developing trust in professionals.

formFields.name: widerpf3
formFields.legend: The parent(s)/carer(s) have insight into the FGM risks extended family and/or community members may pose to their daughter.

formFields.name: widerpf3-father
formFields.legend: Father: The parent(s)/carer(s) have insight into the FGM risks extended family and/or community members may pose to their daughter.

formFields.name: widerpf3-mother
formFields.legend: Mother: The parent(s)/carer(s) have insight into the FGM risks extended family and/or community members may pose to their daughter.
